study_plan_entry.title: High pressure in chemical kinetics and equilibria

free_text.Learning outcomes: To familiarise the students with the theory and the practice of the high pressure chemistry, working up to 2000 bar pressure. Working with pressuriseg gases. [br/]
free_text.Content: Introduction[br/]Pressure effect on chemical kinetics[br/]Pressure effect on chemical equilibria[br/]High pressure UV-Vis spectrophotometry[br/]High pressure FT-IR spectroscopy[br/]High pressure stopped-flow method[br/]Working with pressurised gases[br/]Medium pressure NMR measurements[br/]
free_text.Keywords: high pressure, pressure effect, high pressure gases, activation volume, reaction volume[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Basic knowlwdge on chemical kinetics and equilibria[br/]
